short_description: COSTUME INCLUDES: Minion Stuart Pet Costume
COSTUME INCLUDES: Minion Stuart Pet Costume

EVERY DAY IS AN OCCASION: Great for Halloween, themed parties, festivals, cosplay events, or anytime, because life is more fun in costume.
COSTUME DESTINATION: Rubies aims to spark joy and creativity worldwide as your go-to destination for expertly crafted costumes, accessories, and all celebration needs
Important to review Rubie's Pet Size Chart and measure your dog, the breeds on the size chart are suggestions only
product_description: Banana! Let your pet join the Minion madness with the Despicable Me Minion Stuart Walking Pet Costume by Rubies! This officially licensed costume transforms your furry friend into the lovable one-eyed Minion from the Despicable Me franchise. It features Stuart's signature yellow body with attached soft arms for a fun walking illusion, plus a headpiece with his smiling face and single goggle-clad eye. Comfortable and easy to wear, it’s perfect for Halloween, themed parties, walks in the park, or adorable photoshoots. Get ready for laughs, joy, and tons of attention—your pet will steal the spotlight as the mischievous and charming Stuart! Since 1951, Rubies has been a trusted name in fun, offering safety-tested costumes, wigs, masks, and accessories for kids, adults, pets, and décor. Now part of a global family of brands, Rubies delivers both licensed and original styles designed with quality, comfort, and creativity in mind. From Halloween to everyday play, our wide assortment helps bring imagination to life with on-trend looks and iconic characters. With over 70 years of experience, Rubies continues to inspire unforgettable moments for the whole family—year-round.

Superior Material: The king costume for dogs is made of super soft polyester material, which will let your dog feel comfortable. The dog king crown comes with an elastic strap and an adjustable cord, which will help to fit your pet’s head.
